Label.en: The whole area was once again overflowing with food and people...
Label.fr: Tout le secteur grouillait de monde et de marchandises...
Label.es: The whole area was once again overflowing with food and people...
Label.zh: The whole area was once again overflowing with food and people...

Label.en: So... the government made the decision to move the food market away from Paris in 1960, and implemented it in 1969
Label.fr: La décision de déplacer le marché hors de Paris fut prise en 1960 et mise en oeuvre en 1969
Label.es: So... the government made the decision to move the food market away from Paris in 1960, and implemented it in 1969
Label.zh: So... the government made the decision to move the food market away from Paris in 1960, and implemented it in 1969

Label.en: It was called the 'Relocation of the Ages', and possibly had more impact on Paris than either World War!
Label.fr: Connu comme le 'déménagement du siècle' cet événement eu potentiellement plus d'impact sur Paris que les deux guerres mondiales
Label.es: It was called the 'Relocation of the Ages', and possibly had more impact on Paris than either World War!
Label.zh: It was called the 'Relocation of the Ages', and possibly had more impact on Paris than either World War!
